events.name: Repair Kopitiam July [Jurong and Tampines]
events.description:
Come and repair your broken stuff! Our friendly Repair Coaches will teach and guide you on how to repair them!

We are at:
Block 425 Jurong West Ave 1
Block 819 Tampines Street 81

Come for a cup of drink on us! Bring along your broken items to learn how to mend and repair them for FREE!

See you there! 

Love Your Barang? Fix Your Barang!
events.location: 425 Jurong West Avenue 1 and 819 Tampines Street 81, , Singapore

events.name: Singapore Science Festival: Visual SG: Beauty in Patterns
events.description:
South East Asia’s signature Visualisation Festival, Visual SG, presents a full on visual spectacle of data through the lens of artistic and creative expression. With a line-up of interactive displays, forums and workshops, a highlight includes unwrapping and exploring an Egyptian mummy using an interactive touch table.
 Entry: Admission fees to Science Centre Singapore apply
events.location: Science Centre Singapore, 15 Science Centre Road, Singapore 609081

events.name: League Race #2 - Rerun
events.description:
Location: Marina 'Blackpipes' - check the Google Maps pin: https://goo.gl/maps/kifydJo8idU2 Location is equidistant between Marina Barrage car park and Marina South Pier MRT. 


Registration & Briefing:  3:00PM SHARP! Practice rounds start at 3:10pm.  Qualifiers start at 4pm. Format: Qualifiers: 2.5 minute Most Laps, 5 Rounds, 1 Discard. Finals: Top three scores proceed to a head-to-head race, first past the post to win. For the qualifying rounds we will race three pilots at a time, with the next group of pilots as spotters for the previous group.  Pilots must say their name out loud each time they pass the start/finish gate so that their spotter will count their lap.  Spotters will observe correct navigation of the course and not count any incomplete laps. League points: 5 for 1st, 4 for 2nd, 3 for 3rd, 1 for competing. League score will consist of each pilot's top 5 scores out of 8 most recent events (so not being able to attend one or two events will not be a penalty) Novice fliers may compete following a simplified course, but there are no league points or finals for novice class. Course is designed for 250 sized FPV quads and smaller.  Maximum prop size is 6" for safety reasons. As per usual, we'll be using 3 frequency slots:(Non raceband) 5725 or below, 5800, 5880 or above.(Race band) R1/2, R4/5, R7/8 


First Place Prize: FuriousFPV Kombini - sponsored by furiousfpv. Furiousfpv products can bought at www.65drones.com RotorRiot HQProps - sponsored by HQProps & Skyhobbies - www.skyhobbies.com.sg 


Gates and flags kindly provided by www.65drones.com and www.dronematters.com 


NB - This is a casual meetup and all attendees are responsible for their own safety, compliance with local laws and regulations, and liability.  The host reserves all rights to determine winners and allocate prizes, and all decisions are final.
events.location: Marina Blackpipes, Marina Gardens Drive, Singapore
